1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Meta
4  ( ropsMeta,
5    -- * koshu-cop
6    consKoshuCop, relkitKoshuCop,
7    -- * koshu-cop-infix
8    consKoshuCopInfix, relkitKoshuCopInfix,
9    -- * koshu-source
10    consKoshuSource, relmapKoshuSource,
11    -- * koshu-rop
12    consKoshuRop, relkitKoshuRop,
13    -- * koshu-proxy
14    consKoshuProxy, relkitKoshuProxy,
15    -- * koshu-version
16    consKoshuVersion, relkitKoshuVersion,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Data.Version                   as V
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base           as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax         as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data           as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core           as C
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base       as Op
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message    as Msg
26
27
28-- | Implementation of relational operators.
29--
30--   [@koshu-cop \/N@]
31--     Retrieve list of content operators.
32-- 
33--   [@koshu-cop-infix \/N &#x5B; -height \/N &#x5D;&#x5B; -dir \/N &#x5D;@]
34--     Retrieve list of infix specifications.
35-- 
36--   [@koshu-rop /N@]
37--     Retrieve list of relmap operators.
38-- 
39--   [@koshu-version /N@]
40--     Get version number of the koshu calculator.
41-- 
42ropsMeta :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
43ropsMeta = Op.ropList "meta"
44    --        CONSTRUCTOR        USAGE                       ATTRIBUTE
45    [ Op.def  consKoshuAngleText "koshu-angle-text /N [/N]" "-name -text?"
46    , Op.def  consKoshuCop       "koshu-cop /N"              "-name*"
47    , Op.def  consKoshuCopInfix  "koshu-cop-infix /N [-height /N][-dir /N]"
48                                                             "-name . -height? -dir?"
49    , Op.def  consKoshuSource    "koshu-source /N [-name /N][-type /N]"
50                                                             "-number . -name? -type?"
51    , Op.def  consKoshuRop       "koshu-rop /N /N"           "-name* . -group? -usage?"
52    , Op.def  consKoshuProxy     "koshu-proxy /N /N"         "-proto -uri"
53    , Op.def  consKoshuVersion   "koshu-version /N"          "-term* . -version"
54    ]
55
56
57-- ----------------------  koshu-cop
58
59consKoshuCop :: D.CContent c => C.RopCons c
60consKoshuCop med =
61  do name <- Op.getTerm med "-name"
62     Right $ relmapKoshuCop med name
63
64-- | Create @koshu-cop@ relmap.
65relmapKoshuCop :: (D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> S.TermName -> C.Relmap c
66relmapKoshuCop med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuCop
67
68-- | Create @koshu-cop@ relkit.
69relkitKoshuCop :: (D.CContent c) => S.TermName -> C.RelkitHook c
70relkitKoshuCop name res _ =
71    Right $ C.relkitConstBody [name] $ map (B.li1 . D.pText . B.name) $ C.globalCops g
72          where g = C.getGlobal res
73
74
75-- ----------------------  koshu-cop-infix
76
77consKoshuCopInfix :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
78consKoshuCopInfix med =
79  do name   <- Op.getTerm med "-name"
80     height <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-height"
81     dir    <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-dir"
82     Right $ relmapKoshuCopInfix med (name, height, dir)
83
84-- | Create @koshu-cop-infix@ relmap.
85relmapKoshuCopInfix :: (D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> C.Relmap c
86relmapKoshuCopInfix med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuCopInfix
87
88-- | Create @koshu-cop-infix@ relkit.
89relkitKoshuCopInfix :: (D.CContent c) => (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> C.RelkitHook c
90relkitKoshuCopInfix (name, height, dir) res _ = Right kit2 where
91    g     = C.getGlobal res
92    kit2  = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitConst (map put $ C.globalInfix g)
93    he2   = D.headFrom $ [name] ++ heightMaybe B.li1           ++ dirMaybe B.li1
94    put (n, ih)  = [D.pText n] ++ heightMaybe (heightTerm ih) ++ dirMaybe (dirTerm ih)
95
96    heightMaybe = B.maybeEmpty height
97    dirMaybe    = B.maybeEmpty dir
98
99    heightTerm (Left  h) _ = [D.pInt h]
100    heightTerm (Right h) _ = [D.pInt h]
101
102    dirTerm    (Left  _) _ = [D.pText "left"]
103    dirTerm    (Right _) _ = [D.pText "right"]
104
105
106-- ----------------------  koshu-rop
107
108consKoshuRop :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
109consKoshuRop med =
110  do name  <- Op.getTerm med "-name"
111     group <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-group"
112     usage <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-usage"
113     Right $ relmapKoshuRop med (Just name, group, usage)
114
115-- | Create @koshu-rop@ relmap.
116relmapKoshuRop :: (D.CContent c)
117    => C.Intmed c -> (Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName)
118    -> C.Relmap c
119relmapKoshuRop med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuRop
120
121-- | Create @koshu-rop@ relkit.
122relkitKoshuRop :: (D.CContent c)
123    => (Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName)
124    -> C.RelkitHook c
125relkitKoshuRop (name, group, usage) res _ = Right kit2 where
126    g     = C.getGlobal res
127    kit2  = C.relkitConstBody ns bo2
128    ns    = B.catMaybes [group, name, usage]
129    bo2   = map f $ C.globalRops g
130    f rop = cond group C.ropGroup ++
131            cond name  C.ropName  ++
132            cond usage C.ropUsage
133        where
134          cond (Just _) get = [D.pText $ get rop]
135          cond _ _ = []
136
137
138-- ----------------------  koshu-proxy
139
140consKoshuProxy :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
141consKoshuProxy med =
142  do proto  <- Op.getTerm med "-proto"
143     uri    <- Op.getTerm med "-uri"
144     Right $ relmapKoshuProxy med (Just proto, Just uri)
145
146-- | Create @koshu-proxy@ relmap.
147relmapKoshuProxy :: (D.CContent c)
148    => C.Intmed c -> (Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName)
149    -> C.Relmap c
150relmapKoshuProxy med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuProxy
151
152-- | Create @koshu-proxy@ relkit.
153relkitKoshuProxy :: (D.CContent c)
154    => (Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName)
155    -> C.RelkitHook c
156relkitKoshuProxy (proto, uri) res _ = Right kit2 where
157    g     = C.getGlobal res
158    kit2  = C.relkitConstBody ns bo2
159    ns    = B.catMaybes [proto, uri]
160    bo2   = map f $ C.globalProxy g
161    f proxy = the proto (D.pText . fst) ++
162              the uri   (D.maybeEmpty D.pText . snd)
163        where
164          the (Just _) get  = [get proxy]
165          the _ _           = []
166
167
168-- ----------------------  koshu-version
169
170--  koshu-version /ver
171--  koshu-version /ver [1:0]
172--  koshu-version /ver [1:0] [1:2]
173
174consKoshuVersion :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
175consKoshuVersion med =
176  do n   <- Op.getTerm  med "-term"
177     ver <- Op.getTrees med "-version"
178     case ver of
179       []      -> Right $ C.relmapHook med $ relkitKoshuVersion n
180       [f]     -> check n f f
181       [f, t]  -> check n f t
182       _       -> Msg.unexpAttr ""
183  where
184    check n f t = do
185      from <- D.contentCons undefined f
186      to   <- D.contentCons undefined t
187      Right $ C.relmapHook med $ relkitKoshuVersionCheck (from, to) n
188
189-- | Create @koshu-version@ relkit.
190relkitKoshuVersion :: (D.CContent c) => S.TermName -> C.RelkitHook c
191relkitKoshuVersion n h _ =
192    Right $ C.relkitConstSingleton [n] [ D.pList $ map D.pInt $ apiVersion ver ] where
193        ver = C.globalVersion $ C.getGlobal h
194
195relkitKoshuVersionCheck :: (D.CContent c) => (c, c) -> S.TermName -> C.RelkitHook c
196relkitKoshuVersionCheck (from, to) n h _
197    | verC >= from && verC <= to  = Right kitV
198    | otherwise                   = Right kitE
199    where ver  = C.globalVersion $ C.getGlobal h
200          verC = D.pList $ map D.pInt $ apiVersion ver
201          kitV = C.relkitConstSingleton [n] [verC] -- todo
202          kitE = C.relkitConstEmpty [n]
203
204apiVersion :: V.Version -> [Int]
205apiVersion V.Version { V.versionBranch = ver } =
206    case ver of
207      (a : b : c : _) -> [a, b, c]
208      (a : b : _)     -> [a, b, 0]
209      (a : _)         -> [a, 0, 0]
210      (_)             -> [0, 0, 0]
211
212
213-- ----------------------  koshu-source
214
215--  koshu-source /number -type /type -name /name
216
217consKoshuSource :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
218consKoshuSource med =
219  do num  <- Op.getTerm med "-number"
220     ty   <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-type"
221     name <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-name"
222     Right $ relmapKoshuSource med (num, ty, name)
223
224-- | Create @koshu-source@ relmap.
225relmapKoshuSource :: (D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> C.Relmap c
226relmapKoshuSource med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuSource
227
228-- | Create @koshu-source@ relkit.
229relkitKoshuSource :: (D.CContent c) => (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> C.RelkitHook c
230relkitKoshuSource (num, ty, name) h _ = Right kit2 where
231    code       = C.resIncluded h
232    ns         = B.catMaybes [Just num, ty, name]
233    kit2       = C.relkitConstBody ns $ map assn code
234    assn c     = B.catMaybes [codeNo c, codeType c, codeText c]
235
236    codeNo     = Just         . D.pInt  . B.nioNumber
237    codeType   = maybeAs ty   . D.pText . B.ioPointType . B.nioPoint
238    codeText   = maybeAs name . D.pText . B.ioPointText . B.nioPoint
239
240maybeAs :: Maybe a -> b -> Maybe b
241maybeAs (Just _)  c  =  Just c
242maybeAs (Nothing) _  =  Nothing
243
244
245-- ----------------------  koshu-angle-text
246
247--  koshu-angle-text /name
248--  koshu-angle-text /name /text
249
250consKoshuAngleText :: (Ord c, D.CText c) => C.RopCons c
251consKoshuAngleText med =
252  do n <- Op.getTerm med "-name"
253     c <- Op.getMaybe Op.getTerm med "-text"
254     Right $ relmapKoshuAngleText med (n, c)
255
256-- | Create @koshu-angle-text@ relmap.
257relmapKoshuAngleText :: (Ord c, D.CText c) => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> C.Relmap c
258relmapKoshuAngleText med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitKoshuAngleText
259
260-- | Create @koshu-angle-text@ relkit.
261relkitKoshuAngleText :: (Ord c, D.CText c) => (S.TermName, Maybe S.TermName) -> Maybe D.Head -> B.Ab (C.Relkit c)
262relkitKoshuAngleText (n, Just c) _ = Right kit2 where
263    kit2 = koshuAngleTextBody [n, c] assn
264    assn (name, text) = [D.pText $ "<" ++ name ++ ">", D.pText $ text]
265relkitKoshuAngleText (n, Nothing) _ = Right kit2 where
266    kit2 = koshuAngleTextBody [n] assn
267    assn (name, _)    = [D.pText $ "<" ++ name ++ ">"]
268
269koshuAngleTextBody :: (Ord c, D.CText c) => [S.TermName] -> ((String, String) -> [c]) -> C.Relkit c
270koshuAngleTextBody he assn = C.relkitConstBody he $ B.sort $ map assn S.angleTexts
